short_description: BDL - ABOUT US Leading Software Provider Since - 2002 Established in 2002, BDL specialises in creating innovative logistics and field service software.
long_description: BDL - ABOUT US Leading Software Provider Since - 2002 Established in 2002, BDL specialises in creating innovative logistics and field service software. Opt for BDL for unmatched expertise, cutting-edge technology services, and a dedication to excellence, guaranteeing that your business thrives with tailored, efficient, and secure IT solutions. Our products include Logistics System (LS), Service Management Software (SMS), CourierSoft (CS), and Patient Transport Software (PTS), catering to various industry needs.
